title: Venezuela submits formal proposal to join BRICS bloc
description: The government of Venezuela has taken a significant step in its pursuit of international cooperation by formalizing its proposal to join the BRICS bloc. Led by President Nicolas Maduro, Venezuela has expressed its desire to become a part of the geopolitical and economic alliance that includes Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa.
